tagline.title: Bali Ubud Nights Tour Is Half Day Tour For Enjoy The Nights By Visit Tourist Destination and Dinner in Ubud Village
tagline.text: BALI UBUD NIGHTS TOUR IS HALF DAY TOUR FOR ENJOY THE NIGHTS BY VISIT TOURIST DESTINATION AND DINNER IN UBUD VILLAGE
tagline.html: Bali Ubud Nights Tour Is Half Day Tour For Enjoy The Nights By Visit Tourist Destination and Dinner in Ubud Village

description.text: Bali Ubud Nights Tour is a Bali Half Day Tour Package is a tour that we offer to enjoy the beautiful even day in ubud village by visiting tourist destinations such as ubud monkey forest, saraswati temple and watching legong dance in ubud village and ending with enjoying dinner in ubud village. It is a very impressive experience to spend the night in Ubud village by seeing a very famous tourist destination and watching a very graceful traditional Balinese dance with a storyline that is delivered professionally will make your day very enjoyable. The journey starts in the afternoon, where our tour driver will pick you up and head straight to Ubud village to start this Bali Ubud Nights Tour adventure by visiting the tourist destination Ubud Monkey Forest is a tropical forest area that is sanctified by the local community and inhabited by long-tailed monkeys, and proceed to visit the tourist destination of Ubud Saraswati Temple to see the beauty of the Saraswati Temple with the beauty of the lotus pond which is very pleasing to the eye, followed by watching the Legong dance at the Ubud Palace, seeing the graceful movements of the dancers who bring a very beautiful storyline will make you really carried away by the dance and the story he brought, continued by heading to the restaurant to enjoy this very meaningful dinner, after dinner will head back to your hotel with a very impressive night experience in this Bali Ubud Nights Tour Packages

title.title: Bali Ubud Nights Tour | Ubud Monkey Forest

image.title: Bali Ubud Nights Tour | Ubud Monkey Forest | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Ubud Monkey Forest is a nature reserve temple complex in Ubud Bali. First site visit during Bali Ubud Nights Tour Packages. Its full name as written on a welcome sign is the Padangtegal Mandala Wisata. Bali Ubud Monkey Forest is a small rain forest dwelt by some group of monkeys and other tropical animals. It is strategically located in the hearth of Ubud Village. Monkey Forests in Balinese language called Wanara Wana are spread out in the island and Ubud Monkey Forest itself own very important function of the continuity the monkey habitat in Bali. Meanwhile the local community own important role to keep this forest naturally in order to all wild animals able to live smoothly. A small tropical forest in the center of Ubud city offers very beautiful natural beauty, besides the monkeys here you can also visit the temple inside

title.title: Bali Ubud Nights Tour | Saraswati Temple

image.title: Bali Ubud Nights Tour | Saraswati Temple | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Saraswati Temple Ubud with real name Pura Taman Saraswati is a Hindu temple located in the village of Ubud and dedicated to Goddess Saraswati who is the protective goddess of mankind according to the beliefs of Hindus in Bali. Second site we visit during Bali Ubud Nights Tour Packages. Located in the center of Ubud, which is often visited by tourists who want to visit the uniqueness of the Saraswati Temple, Ubud with all its beauty makes it a favorite tourist destination to visit in this Ubud village. With a large lotus fond that adds to the beauty of this Saraswati temple, if you visit Ubud village, you shouldn't miss this tourist destination, you can walk around this Saraswati temple and see the beauty of the temple here with a typical Balinese design shape and in front there is a lotus pond that is so beautiful.

title.title: Bali Ubud Nights Tour | Legong Dance

image.title: Bali Ubud Nights Tour | Legong Dance | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Legong Dance also called with name Bali Legong Keraton Dance is one of the traditional Balinese dances introduced to foreign tourists as a dance performance performed by very professional Balinese dancers with very beautiful dance curves that will make you fascinated with the beautiful curves of these dancers. Third site we visit during Bali Ubud Nights Tour Packages. This Legong Keraton Dance is usually performed by female dancers with the characteristic of carrying fans and accompanied by gamelan music (traditional Balinese musical instruments) where this Legong Keraton Dance is a cultural heritage that has existed since ancient times which was used as a dance performance for ancient kingdoms.and now the Legong Keraton Dance is developed by a dance studio which is made as a tourism dance performance.

price.title: Bali Ubud Nights Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Ubud Nights Tour Price :

The tour we provide is Based on Private Tour, We offer two price you can choose which is Regular Tours Price and Inclusive Tours Price, Please see below the details of Half Day Ubud Tour Packages price :

Regular Tours Price :

IDR 375,000/car ( 1 till 6 person included)
IDR 850,000/minibus ( 1 till 12 person included)
IDR 1,150,000/minibus ( 1 till 17 person included)
IDR 2,500,000/bus ( 1 till 30 person included)
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + English Speaking Driver
Note : Parking Fee, Entrance fee and Dinner is not include in the price

Or

Inclusive Tours Price :

IDR 600,000/person
Note : For Inclusive Price is minimun Booking 2 Person
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + Parking Fee + English Speaking Driver + Entrance Fee + Dinner Indonesian Food + Mineral Water

content.event: Visit Ubud Monkey Forest
Visit Ubud Saraswati Temple
Watching Legong Dance Performance

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • Regular Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price without include dinner and entrance fee cost, you need to pay by your own self
  • Inclusive Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price with include lunch and entrance fee
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
